001package edu.pdx.cs410J.whitlock;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ProjectXmlHelper;
004
005public class AppointmentBookXmlHelper extends ProjectXmlHelper {
006
007  /**
008   * The System ID for the Family Tree DTD
009   */
010  protected static final String SYSTEM_ID =
011    "http://www.cs.pdx.edu/~whitlock/dtds/apptbook.dtd";
012
013  /**
014   * The Public ID for the Family Tree DTD
015   */
016  protected static final String PUBLIC_ID =
017    "-//Portland State University//DTD CS410J Appointment Book//EN";
018
019  protected AppointmentBookXmlHelper() {
020    super(PUBLIC_ID, SYSTEM_ID, "apptbook.dtd");
021  }
022}
